categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tabrungi was a senior male Jedi Padawan who was enrolled in the Jedi Order's academy on Coruscant.

Brought to the Temple at a young age, Tabrungi was selected by a Jedi Master before the Clone Wars. Soon after the Battle of Kothlis, Tabrungi joined fellow Padawan Ahsoka Tano as part of Green team in a competition arranged by Master Taria Damsin. The competition, taking place in the new Sublevel Nineteen Training Dojo, ended in a tie. It is unknown if Tabrungi was one of the two members of Green team to make it all the way through the dojo.
